title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.6 - Transcripts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.6 - Transcripts

State Regulations

All hearings, whether before the Banking Board or a hearing
officer, shall be stenographically recorded and transcribed. Copies of such
transcript may be purchased from the reporter by the respondent and the
superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
